text.fire_extinguisher.fire_extinguisher: The fire exstinguisher is able to remove fire from smaller areas and can freeze mobs for a small amount of time.
► To use the fire extinguisher target a block which is on (or next to the) fire and press the right mouse button.
► To place the fire extinguisher, sneak and press the right mouse button.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_axe_descript: The fire axe is able to remove fire within 1-2 blocks around a destroyed block.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_axe_use: ► To use the fire axe target a block which is on fire and destroy the block.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_helmet_descr: The fire helmet protects you a little from fire, but your are not fire proofed.
